text: Imana ntiyashize k’umuntu imitima ibiri mugikiriza ciwe, kandi ntiyagize abatambukanyi banyu mwatumbereje nabo imigongo yabo hamwe n’imigongo yabanyina banyu yuko banyina banyu, kandi ntiyagize ibibondo vyanyu vy’abazanano yuko bari mubibondo vyanyu kama, ayo n’amajambo yanyu yaturutse muminwa yanyu n’Imana niyo ivugisha ukuri kwama nayo niyo irongora inzira y’uburongozi bwiza
